name: Peoples Yoga
tag_list: online-yoga-videos, free-online-yoga-classes, how-to-do-yoga, yoga-on-demand, practice-yoga-onilne, yoga-exercise-videos, yoga-videos, yoga-on-line, yoga-instruction, beginner-yoga
overview: Peoples Yoga empowers you with the life changing and wellness enhancing qualities of Yoga through High Definition Yoga Videos which you can view or download from their website in the privacy of your home, office or hotel room at anytime of the day or night at your convenience. You choose from different levels, Yoga styles, Instructors and video length to suit your abilities or to play your edge. You will be inspired by their library of expert instructors while you immerse yourself in your chosen yoga practice. They even give you a chance to check things out with a free trial.
